siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Just in time for Shrove "Pancake Day" Tuesday! Discover your new favourite pancake recipe or over 100 different other amazing recipes from the internets most entertaining food influencers.
blogPost.body: Just in time for Shrove "Pancake Day" Tuesday! Discover your new favourite pancake recipe or over 100 different other amazing recipes from the internets most entertaining food influencers.
blogPost.title: TikTok Cookbook - A collection of 100+ TikTok food recipes
blogPost.author: Dominic Norton

localize.description: 正好赶上周二的Shrove "煎饼日"! 发现你最喜欢的煎饼食谱或超过100个不同的其他惊人的食谱，从互联网最娱乐的食品影响者。
正好趕上週二的Shrove "煎餅日"! 發現你最喜歡的煎餅食譜或超過100個不同的其他驚人的食譜，從互聯網最娛樂的食品影響者。

previous.excerpt: Share your workouts from Apple Health and supported services through beautiful and unique story templates. Track your distance goals and earn collectible achievement medals on your journey.
previous.title: Any Distance - Share your workouts, track your goals, earn achievements.

localize.description: 通过精美独特的故事模板，分享你在 Apple Health 和支持服务中的锻炼成果。追踪你的距离目标，并在你的旅程中获得可收藏的成就奖章。
localize.tagline: 分享你的锻炼，跟踪你的目标，赚取成就。

localize.description: 通過精美獨特的故事模板，分享你在 Apple Health 和支持服務中的鍛鍊成果。追蹤你的距離目標，並在你的旅程中獲得可收藏的成就獎章。
localize.tagline: 分享你的鍛鍊，跟蹤你的目標，賺取成就。

next.excerpt: Writing your negative thoughts down on a piece of paper and then discarding them can help you find peace. Thought Detox brings this experience to your iPhone, letting you write out your thoughts and then release them — without storing or sending them anywhere.
next.title: Thought Detox - Private notes to clear your mind

localize.description: 将你的负面想法写在纸上，然后丢弃，可以帮助你找到平静。Thought Detox将这种体验带到你的iPhone上，让你写出你的想法，然后释放它们--无需存储或发送它们到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人笔记，让你头脑清醒

localize.description: 將你的負面想法寫在紙上，然後丟棄，可以幫助你找到平靜。Thought Detox將這種體驗帶到你的iPhone上，讓你寫出你的想法，然後釋放它們--無需存儲或發送它們到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人筆記，讓你頭腦清醒
